title: Half my games so far is still determined by inting jungle and bot lane
body: Riot games: lets nerf TP for top lane so they have no impact!

replies.body: And i've had games lost by top inting, almost like it's more about having inters in your team rather than a specific lane problem?
That's 3/5 of the team so that makes sense. Over half of the game involves bot lane and jungle.
This means that I cant win all my games just split pushing top with Nasus and that this game is a 5vs5? Heretic.
https://img.ifcdn.com/images/d1979804df81bfbd2316b4aba366d96f7c97899282e6e5b87a5be465871bef5b_1.jpg
Maybe if they nerfed {{summoner:14}} then everyone wouldn't have to abuse TP. I mean every support and mid laner takes it. EVEN ENCHANTER SUPPORTS TAKE IT.
The actual context for the nerf was that it was starting to crowd out the other summoner spells in organized play (we're talking 3+ Champions with TP per team per game).

> [{quoted}](name=DarkSoul1994,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PTTI6bQ2,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-07-18T08:16:17.702+0000)
>
> The actual context for the nerf was that it was starting to crowd out the other summoner spells in organized play.

Who cares about pro play? im talking restrictively from solo q perspective.

> **Organized** play.

Organized meaning a pre-made of 2 or more. All it takes is a bot lane duo to both take TP and suddenly you have 3-4 Teleports on your team. That was happening more than you'd realize.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkSoul1994,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PTTI6bQ2,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-07-18T08:16:17.702+0000)
>
> The actual context for the nerf was that it was starting to crowd out the other summoner spells in organized play (we're talking 3+ Champions with TP per team per game).

meanwhile we still have flash

lol just carry 
         -Riot Games
Jokes on you riot doesn't give a literal flying shit about anyone but jungle mains bot laners and Janna abusers
{{sticker:sg-janna}}
REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
It is always the master yi who invades the enemy red buff isn't it?

> [{quoted}](name=Crimson Zeppelin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PTTI6bQ2,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-07-18T11:02:53.476+0000)
>
> It is always the master yi who invades the enemy red buff isn't it?

No, we usually lose to the guy.

Fuck off TP is a broken summoner spell that needs a nerf and botlane + jng is 3/5 part of the team so ofc you will lose a lot of games if they are behind.

I actually cant believe that toplane mains are still crying. And please, we should to remove the Gameplay Boards.

? XD its been like 6 to 8 patches since that first TP change and all of the sudden people crying its OP? litteraly just buff heal and the problem is fixed????

(Before 8.11) Adcs too op I can't kill them while their baby sitter is there and they just blow me up! 
(After patch 8.11) my adcs are all inting and worthless omg.

Lol

> [{quoted}](name=saltran,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PTTI6bQ2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-18T08:03:45.915+0000)
>
> Fuck off TP is a broken summoner spell 

meanwhile this bad boy still exists {{summoner:4}}

Just the rito classic. 
Nerf conq for absolutely no reason other than reddit bitching. 
Nerf steraks to hell because reddit was bitching. 
Then nerf tp to fuck toplaners again, buff pantheon, ignore quinn, kennen, jayce and move on. 

3 weeks patch and nothing done in this patch besides nerfing toplane again for no reason and introducing more dmg in runes. Oh we tuned zoe a bit, nerf to wuk and talon okay. Irrelevant change to rakan who keeps being toptier all year long because riot doesnt know where his problem lies. 

There just aren't any toplaners left to complain anymore. The two lowest skillroles are the most impactful for god knows what reason. No competitive game ever has survived by catering towards bad players same will happen to league. 

Btw those who write (or dictate what they have to write) the patch notes  should be immediately fired. Such a dumb fuckin statement. "Conq has been crowding out other keystone options for fighters, as well as room for non-fighter toplaners". 
How about these chimps start playing or atleast watching their own fuckin game? 
Best toplaners currently are NON FIGHTERS who also DONT TAKE CONQUERER. 
Conqs. laning strength? Gimme a break. 
Crowding out keystones? "Hey riot fighters dont have a keystone, can we get one?" *riot creates keystone SPECIFICALLY FOR FIGHTERS* "yeah fighters start taking the keystone we made for them, NERF IT ASAP". 

Like, please playerbase realize these people are ACTUALLY having a JOB that PAYS THEM THOUSANDS OF DOLLAR PER MONTH to make these decisions and dumb statements. 
This must be some social experiment or all year aprils fool.

http://na.op.gg/champion/statistics whats funny is that most of the bruisers who use conq dont even exceed super high pickrate and go hover over Jungle Bot and Support. Graves 51% winrate with an immense 17% pickrate, kindred 53% wr with 14% pickrate. "aDcS aRe wEak" yet MF is 53% 11% pickrate and then u have jhin/ez/lucian/kaisa having around 17%-34% pickrates. Even the ones that dont excel in this early meta Vayne Xayah still holds 48%-49% with a decent 8% pickrate.
